Description.Text:
Property Location
A stay at Hotel Paradis places you in the heart of Lourdes, walking distance from Musee Grevin de Lourdes and Basilica of St. Pius X. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Chateau de Lourdes and Sanctuary of our Lady of Lourdes.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 300 air-conditioned guestrooms. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Bathrooms have bathtubs or showers and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, and cribs/infant beds can be requested.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take in the views from a rooftop terrace and a terrace and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access. This hotel also features gift shops/newsstands, shopping on site, and a television in the lobby. Guests can catch a ride to nearby destinations on the area shuttle (surcharge).

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner, or grab a snack at a coffee shop/café. Relax with a refreshing drink at one of the 2 bars/lounges.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access, a computer station, and express check-out. Planning an event in Lourdes? This hotel has 2691 square feet (250 square meters) of space consisting of a conference center and meeting rooms. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.
